title: hey i need some answers about patching
body: * hey i have a 7mbps internet , im patching league but speed is only 5kbps why ??

replies.body: Patching time can vary depending on a couple factors, like your network strength or even how fast your drive can write these updates.  Usually, a tune up of your connection trick can do the trick so I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide just for that.  This will help make sure your settings and connection are strong for the long haul!  Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BRkvgr1K,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-30T16:25:09.954+0000)
>

Usually, a tune up of your connection trick can do the trick so I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide just for that.
